titles.title: To designate the Administrator of the Small Business Administration as a member of the Interagency Trade Organization.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E712-713)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/19/1994--Introduced. Amends the Trade Expansion Act of 1962 to designate the Administrator of the Small Business Administration as a member of the interagency trade organization.
